pkgmetadata.longdescription: # NyckelPython package for <www.nyckel.com>![build](https://github.com/NyckelAI/python-sdk/actions/workflows/build.yml/badge.svg)![test](https://github.com/NyckelAI/python-sdk/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg)## Local development* Run Nyckel Server and Trainer instances locally* pytest -s
